name: Clear Action Queue
description: Clears a specified or all action queue(s).

fields.fieldDescription: The queue that you want to be cleared.

fieldOptions.optionDescription: Clears all action queues.
A list of your action queues.

name: Get Action Group State
description: Gets the action's group's enabled state of your specified group.

fields.fieldDescription: The group where you want to get the state of.

fieldOptions.optionDescription: Default value, gets no state.
A list of your action groups.

name: Get Action State
description: Get the action's enabled state of your specified action.

fields.fieldDescription: The action you where you want to get the enabled state from.

fieldOptions.optionDescription: A list of your actions.

fields.fieldDescription: The action what you want to run.
Wheter this action should follow the action's queue.

fieldStates.enabled: Action does folllow the action queue.
fieldStates.disabled: Action doesn't folllow the action queue.

name: Set Action Group State
description: Sets the action's group's enabled state of your specified group.

fields.fieldDescription: The group where you want to set the state of.

fieldOptions.optionDescription: Default value, sets no state.
A list of your action groups.

fields.fieldDescription: Wheter the action group should be enabled, disabled or toggled.

fieldOptions.optionDescription: Enables the specified action group.
Disables the specified action group.
Toggles the specified action group between enabled and disabled.

name: Set Action Queue Pause State
description: Pauses or resumes a specified action queue.

fields.fieldDescription: The queue you want to change the pause state of.

fieldOptions.optionDescription: All the action queues you have.
A list of your action queues.

fields.fieldDescription: Wheter the queue should be paused or resumed.

fieldOptions.optionDescription: If you want the queue to be paused.
If you want the queue to be resumed.

fieldStates.disabled: Doesn't clear the specified action queue

name: Set Action State
description: Disables or enables the specified action.

fields.fieldDescription: The action you want to enable or disabled.

fieldOptions.optionDescription: A list of your actions.

fields.fieldDescription: Wheter the action should be enabled or disabled.

fieldOptions.optionDescription: If you want to enable the specified action.
If you want to disabled the specified action.
If you want to toggle the enabled state between enabled or disabled for the specified action.

name: Fetch Url
description: Fetches your url and outputs it as a variable.

fields.fieldDescription: The HTTP headers that will be used in your fetch.

fieldOptions.optionDescription: The name of the HTTP header.
The value of the HTTP header.
